Text: why does this say HD dvdrip they dont release anything on HD dvd's anymore becuase blu ray is better and regular dvd's are not released with HD content.

How to burn HD DVD/Blu-Ray movie after ripping it to harddisk with AnyDVD HD
AnyDVD HD can't burn HD DVD/Blu-Ray disc. To burn them you need HD DVD/Blu-Ray burning software and HD DVD burner or Blu-Ray burner. The latest version of Nero Burning ROM supports both HD DVD and Blu-Ray formats. You will also need a blank media like BD-R, BD-RE for Blu-Ray burner and HD DVD-R for HD DVD burner.
